title: Kapljuh
summary: Kapljuh (Serbian Cyrillic: Капљух) is a village in the municipality of Bosanski Petrovac, Bosnia and Herzegovina.
content:
Kapljuh (Serbian Cyrillic: Капљух) is a village in the municipality of Bosanski Petrovac, Bosnia and Herzegovina.


== Demographics ==
According to the 2013 census, its population was 27, all Serbs.
